properties.entry: SELECT PRODUCT_CATEGORY from product group by PRODUCT_CATEGORY
INSERT INTO PRODUCT( PRODUCT_NO, PRODUCT_CATEGORY, COMPANY, PRODUCT_NAME, PRICE, INVENTORY, INGREDIENT, ORIGIN, PRODUCT_WEIGHT, KCAL ) values( SEQ_PNO.NEXTVAL, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ? )
INSERT INTO ATTACHMENT_PRODUCT( FILE_NO, REF_PNO, ORIGIN_NAME, CHANGE_NAME, FILE_PATH, FILE_LEVEL ) values( SEQ_APNO.NEXTVAL, SEQ_PNO.CURRVAL, ?, ?, ?, ? )
